words.source: H1696 (דָּבַר, 'to speak'), conjunction + Piel wayyiqtol 3ms; KJV 'And the LORD spake', ESV 'the LORD spoke', NASB 'Then the LORD spoke'
H3068 (יְהוָה, 'the LORD'), proper noun divine; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'the LORD'
H413 (אֶל, 'to/unto'), preposition; KJV 'unto', ESV 'to', NASB 'to'
H4872 (מֹשֶׁה, 'Moses'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Moses'
H413 (אֶל, 'to'), conjunction + preposition; KJV 'and unto', ESV 'and', NASB 'and to'
H175 (אַהֲרֹן, 'Aaron'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Aaron'
H6680 (צָוָה, 'to command'), conjunction + Piel wayyiqtol 3ms + 3mp suffix; KJV 'and gave them a charge', ESV 'and charged them', NASB 'and He commanded them'
H413 (אֶל, 'to/unto'), preposition; KJV 'unto', ESV 'to go to', NASB 'to go to'
H1121 (בֵּן, 'son'), noun common masculine plural construct; KJV 'the children of', ESV 'the people of', NASB 'the sons of'
H3478 (יִשְׂרָאֵל, 'Israel'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Israel'
H413 (אֶל, 'to'), conjunction + preposition; KJV 'and unto', ESV 'and to', NASB 'and to'
H6547 (פַּרְעֹה, 'Pharaoh'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Pharaoh'
H4428 (מֶלֶךְ, 'king'), noun common masculine singular construct; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'king of'
H4714 (מִצְרַיִם, 'Egypt'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Egypt'
H3318 (יָצָא, 'to go out'), preposition-lamed + Hiphil infinitive construct; KJV 'to bring … out', ESV 'to bring … out', NASB 'to bring … out'
H853 (אֵת), particle direct object marker; untranslated in English
H1121 (בֵּן, 'son'), noun common masculine plural construct; KJV 'the children of', ESV 'the people of', NASB 'the sons of'
H3478 (יִשְׂרָאֵל, 'Israel'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Israel'
H776 (אֶרֶץ, 'land/earth'), preposition-min + noun common feminine singular construct; KJV 'out of the land of', ESV 'out of the land of', NASB 'from the land of'
H4714 (מִצְרַיִם, 'Egypt'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Egypt'
